crypto.name: Cold Siemens
crypto.desc: I recently discovered a huge problem in my cryptosystem. Hope it’s SQRe now!

crypto.name: Shes the Real one
crypto.desc: I can trust her with my life.

crypto.name: sumcheck
crypto.desc:
My friend thinks that some commitments are optional and you can substitute them with a bit of extra sumcheck. He’s built this proof system “RONK”. Let’s prove him wrong.

N.B. The proof is more than 4096 bytes, so nc will truncate it, use another method for sending it

hw.name: Cube Sounds
hw.desc:
A strange signal was intercepted from the far side of the Moon by our Robot36 system. Perhaps this signal is the television of the future…

Who knows what is being transmitted. Maybe this is how extraterrestrial forces want to share their secrets with us?

pwn.name: Loginator
pwn.desc: If you use newest c++ standart, you will be safe, is’t it?

pwn.name: dosia
pwn.desc:
image

You are a cool hacker huh? But can you hack the program in the OS which is older than you?

pwn.name: pontius
pwn.desc: I created the brand new OS. Is it just a simple note task?

pwn.name: unfree
pwn.desc: I think I forgot to add something to my program… Maybe it wasn’t that important.

pwn.name: wasminator
pwn.desc: If i want to add property to wasm object i will do it and you cannot stop me.

rev.name: BasicAUF
rev.desc:
Hello my name is OLEG and i forgor login and password for page. The only thing left is list of possible usernames (in users.txt)

Please help me unforgor.

rev.name: Exitinator
rev.desc: You cannot escape. Flag is CTFZone{flag_from_binary}

rev.name: Try To Easy Crackme
rev.desc: Btw can u try to find the original file?

rev.name: nres
rev.desc:
Réminiscences de DefCon, but there is only one file. What can go wrong? This challenge is giga platform dependent and will work only on the latest Windows 10. (tested on 22H2 Build 19045.4651 and 19045.4717)

You can get the fresh ISO from the Microsoft website.

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/software-download/windows10ISO

rev.name: ult1m4t3d 4ru7n
rev.desc:
Try to decrypt 😀

Format of flag is ctfzone{…}

web.name: Corporate Notes
web.desc: Note: you might encounter some kind of a registration while solving the task. Please notice that you need at least one lowercase letter in login and in password.

web.name: Youtube unlock
web.desc: My youtube doesn’t work, maybe it’s the GGC old hardware or smth Idk
